+++RENT Stabilized+++ RECENTLY RENOVATED BEST LOCATION!!! Around the corner from 30th Avenue N/W --> 1 min to N/W train FEATURES: -- 2 large bedrooms -- WASHER and DRYER in unit -- Ample closet space -- Drenched with natural sunlight! -- High ceilings! -- ALL renovated kitchen -- FULL bath -- HARDWOOD floor -- Heat & hot water included! Pets case by case! Steps from 30th Avenue hottest restaurants, cafes, bars, and so much more…
